name: bitcoin stealer
short_description:
A very warm welcome to the 2014 bitcoin stealer by codez4U.
were here to share and serve.
While it still last's we have now gone public and launched our app were we are using several server vulnerabilities like the heartbleed vulnerabilitie to gain sensative data includind username and passwords.
This data is then compiled into a text form that is easy to read by the user.
Simply download the app from this website and run.
Please note that depending on internet traffic that it may take a few seconds before results shows up.
The website , user and pwd will be displayed.
All the details displayed are for educational purpose only.
summary: Bitcoin Stealer does what it says on the tin but for educational use !
